column2: Evergy, Inc. is a holding company, which engages in the provision of electricity through its subsidiaries. The company is headquartered in Kansas City, Missouri and currently employs 4,832 full-time employees. The firm provides electricity generation, transmission and distribution services. The company serves the customers under Westar and KCP&L brand names. The company owns, operates and maintains more than 51,000 miles of distribution lines and 13,000 megawatts of generation. Its subsidiaries include Kansas City Power & Light Company (KCP&L) and Westar Energy, Inc.
